divs: sighting details the object was east in the sky when i saw it first. new info: the second time i saw it in the sky two nights ago it had re-positioned itself more towards the north. tonight i noticed that it has re-positioned itself back to in the eastern sky again. this is about 10:00 pm. the investigator who i spoke to said it could be a planet or a satellite. with the clear skies tonight the object is noticeable. and so is the big dipper that i look for at night when i take my dogs out. at this time 11:07 pm i went back outside and looked again. it had moved back to the more north position. i didn't see it move because i was inside my home at the time. i tried to see if there may be another star- like object but i saw none. the moon is full and in a south east position 1\3% in the sky.
Summary: Reported this 1st time less than a month ago and received call from investigator.
